channel.title: Donation system with "pins"
channel.description: im trying to setup a automatic donation system using ::claim , mysql ,php ,paypal.... here 1 way of setting it up make all ur pin codes so they will show up and be deleted on a mysql. next is to make a php code that integrates mysql and paypal together. and after you finished donating it give you the pin code ,when you enter it on the server it deletes it self from mysql and the pins file that way it can only be used once. please if any knows how to do this or has any other theories on how to do this post here or msn me at zachtucker18@hotmail.com
